meta.description: I'm a freelance software engineer based in Belgium who is passionate about building challenging (web)applications. Get in touch!

header.subline: I'm a freelance software engineer based in Belgium who is passionate about building challenging (web)applications.

service1.title: Software Development
service1.content: Starting from scratch or adding features/maintaining existing projects. Both solo or as an extra asset for your existing team. Preferably backend, but I'm not discouraged by doing frontend as well.

service2.title: Analysis
service2.content: Do you have an idea for a (web)application, but don't know where to start or how to develop it yourself? I can help you by translating your needs to developer terms.

service3.title: Coaching
service3.content: Are you a junior developer or student looking to boost your technical skills and advance your career? I can help with hands-on coding guidance, career mentoring or even programming tutoring. Letâ€™s start with a video call or going for a coffee to see how I can help!

service4.title: Web Design
service4.content: You want a personal website or a website for your business? I can help with that. See this website for an example.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.paragraph1: From an early age I developed a taste for everything that involved computers.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I was very eager to start studying basic computer programming, networking and hardware in high school. To pursue my passion I then decided to enroll at Karel de Grote University College in Antwerp, where I earned a Bachelor's Degree of Applied Computer Science with a focus on Application Development.
aboutMe.paragraph3: My experience includes backend, frontend and deployment aspects of the development cycle. Although I have a slight preference for the first, I will definitely not be discouraged by the other two.
aboutMe.paragraph4: I believe that my greatest strength is the ability to adapt quickly to new technologies, which is required in an innovative and dynamic sector. The challenge to stay up to date with the newest technologies and trends and gain knowledge on them, is what appeals most to me in the job.
aboutMe.paragraph5: Below I compiled a list of technologies I feel confident in. Altough I previously dealt with various other computer technologies, it's nearly impossible to list all of them.
aboutMe.paragraph6: Apart from writing code, I have several other activities. I played basketball for almost 20 years, but in 2022 I decided it was time to look for something more flexible to pass my free time. I replaced basketball with go karting and trying out other sports every now and then like padel. Next to that I have a big wanderlust and I like to travel a lot. Once a year I try to do a multi-day hike to detox from my day to day job.
